roles.name: Super User
roles.description: System Administrator. Can change all master data and has access to all the system screens.

roles.name: TL Counter Employee
roles.description: Counter Employee in Trade License who files TL on behalf of the citizen

roles.name: TL Approver
roles.description: Approver who verifies and approves the TL application

roles.name: Finance Adminsitrator
roles.description: All Employees who are Finance application administrator
